search.query: `cs_o365_defender_atp_audit` host=$tkn_host|s$ | dedup host | rex "^The defender ATP (?<status>[\w\s]+) installed\. OnboardingState=(?<OnboardingState>.+), LastConnected=(?<LastConnected>.+)$" | eval status= if(status="is" AND OnboardingState=1, "Installed", "Not Installed") | eval LastConnectedEpoch = strptime(LastConnected, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S %Z") | fillnull OnboardingState value="-" | table host, status, OnboardingState, LastConnected, _time | sort - status, + OnboardingState

html.p: Data Collection: Use Defender ATP Status Check Add-on.
This search checks the last 4 hours to see Defender ATP configuration on Windows machines.

search.query: index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd "ERROR" "splunk-powershell.ps1" host=$tkn_host_error_message|s$ | dedup host | table host, _time

html.p: The data collection works based on PowerShell script from Splunk. In some cases Windows machine do not allow PowerShell script execution in that case above panel show those errors.
